mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (member_id, pw, name, email, nickname, postcode, address, detail, birth, phone) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{postcode}, #{address}, #{detail}, #{birth}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT question_id questionId, member_id memberId, title, inserted, email, enable FROM Faq WHERE member_id = #{memberId} order by enable DESC, question_id desc
SELECT question_id questionId, member_id memberId, title, content, email FROM Faq WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
